content.legion: Chance to recover %Max HP while attacking (10s cd)

pros: Has a berserk mode Adrenaline Rush where you enter a rampage

Good mobbing and a hard hitter
  • Can deal with Elite Monsters no problem early levels
Has lifesteal from Drain
Good Link Skill for training Combo Kill Blessing
cons:
Combo Commands may be hard to get a hang of making class hard to master but easy to start with
  • You can still assign them to Skill Keys
Button mashy especially with Smash Swing basic attack
4th Job bossing skill Beyond Blade may be hard to get a hang of

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives and buffs with cooldowns
Crit Rate: +20% + (up to 50% from Advanced Combo Ability)
Damage: +20% + (10% when attacking slowed enemies)
Final Damage: +(15% from Swing Studies buff)

For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

extraContent.title: Combo System
extraContent.content:
Aran has a special Combo mechanic where each hit that Aran lands, increases your Combo count. As your Combo count increases, you gain bonus stats like Attack, DEF, and %Crit Rate

Additionally in 3rd Job, every time you hit 1000 Combo, you gain access to Adrenaline Mode that causes you to go temporarily berserk and your attacks gain special abilties

Aran's attacks are special in that they can be activated by pressing buttons in a certain order to activate them. You can also assign the skills to Key Slots if you are not comfortable with the first option

details: Gained from completing Arkarium storyline/pre-quests

primary.desc: Double jump and dash skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice or pressing the Forward Arrow Key twice
If used on the ground, you will dash forward
If used in the air, you will perform a double jump
[Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed and Max Movement Speed

primary.desc: Teleports to Rien, Aran's hometown
Swings your polearm up to three times consecutively
Fires a burst of energy forward that pierces through enemies
details:
[Command]: Down, Right + Attack Key
  • [Note]: Combo Attacks can be locked (right-clicking a skill) to prevent the Skill from activating with Key Inputs

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
While active, reflect back damage taken
Dashes forward while also pushing back enemies
details:
[Command]: Left, Down, Right + Attack Key
  • Command version will stun enemies

primary.desc: Lifts multiple enemies in front of you into the air
details:
[Command]: Up + Attack Key
  • Command version increases jump height
Can be used twice
Deals additional %p Damage to airborne enemies

primary.desc: Spin your polearm while standing in place
details:
[Command]: Down, Up + Attack Key
  • Command version stuns enemies hit
Lifts enemies up into the air

primary.desc: Attacks slow enemy movement speed
details:
Attacking enemies with slowed movement will deal increased %Damage
  • Can be used on bosses but slow duration is cut in half
[Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage

primary.desc: Increases %p Damage of and increases Movement Speed during swings
details: Using will grant a brief %Final Damage increase to your other skills
[Final Attack]: Creates an additional attack whenever you use other skills after

primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

details: Increases %Knockback Resistance provided
Now increases %Crit Rate for every 50 combo and grants flat Attack for every 10 combo (up to 10 stacks)
Now grants flat Attack and increases Abnormal Status Resistance, %Elemental Resistance, %Crit Rate, and %Crit Damage

primary.desc: At 1000 Combos, you enter an Adrenaline state where your skills are enhanced and gain increased %p Damage
details: Additionally attacks have increased hits per attack and maximum number of enemies hit
will shoot out three projectiles
will leave an ice trail that freezes enemies
will shoot out a shockwave in front of you
[Passive]: Permanently increases your %p Damage of skills

primary.desc: Swings your polearm to create a swiping attack
details:
[Command]: Down + Attack Key
  • Command version prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
The third swing from will automatically be a Final Blow
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

primary.desc: Slams your polearm into the ground damaging nearby enemies
details:
[Command]: Up, Down OR Forward/Up + Attack Key
  • Command version will freeze enemies
  • Using the Forward/Up version will instead attack diagonally
    • Allows you to snap onto ledges and acts as a short-ranged teleport

primary.desc: Gathers nearby enemies to in front of you
details:
[Command]: Up, Up + Attack Key
  • Command version can be used to animation cancel

primary.desc: Performs 3 separate attacks consecutively, dealing increased %Damage the fewer enemies hit
details: Can only be used linked after using
While casting, prevents you from being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Has additional %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
In , shockwaves will shot both in front and behind you

primary.desc: Creates a whirlwind around you that pulls in nearby enemies
details: Can only be used in and only one finisher can be used per rush

Can only be activated with Command
  • Down, Left, Right + Attack Key (held down)

primary.desc: Charges forward to strike a powerful blow while targeting the most powerful enemy in the direction you are facing
details:
The longer you charge, the more damage dealt
  • You are invincible while charging
Can only be used in and only one finisher can be used per rush

Can only be activated with Command
  • Down, Right, Down + Attack Key (held down)
Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
Increases %p Damage of , , , , and

details: Increases %p Damage bonus provided for command triggered skills
Increases %p Damage and %Final Damage buff provided for
Increases %Damage and number of hits of afterimage Final Attack
Increases activation chance, %Damage, and number of hits
Now additionally grants flat Attack

hyperActive.desc: Instantly activates
Summons a giant polearm create a zone which restores %Max HP/MP of party members every second
details: Enemies that enter the zone create explosions that deal damage and cure party members' of Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Maha's Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, instantly increases combo to 100, Maha empowers you for 55 sec, Attack Power: +30%\nBlizzard Damage: 900% every 3 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Number of Attacks: 5\nCooldown: 150 sec
fifthMain.desc: Equips Maha which will instantly increase combo to 100 and grants %Attack Power
details: Requires to be active

fifthMain.name: Maha's Carnage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 10, Chase Cut Activation Count: 2, Boss Damage: +20%\nCooldown: 20 sec, reduced by 50% when Maha's Fury is activated.
fifthMain.desc: Swing Maha and slam it into the ground leaving a trail of destruction
details:
[Command]: Down, Down + Attack Key
  • Command version prevents knockback
Unaffected by Damage Reduction and Damage Reflect
Has increased %Boss Damage
Cooldown is reduced by half if is active

fifthMain.name: Fenrir Crash
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 200, Damage: 625%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 10
For each enemy struck fewer than Max Enemies Hit, 6% of the damage that would be dealt is doubled and inflicted as bonus damage.
Additional Critical Rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +50%
Creates an iceberg that hits up to 10 enemies for 625% damage 6 time(s) if Adrenaline Rush is active.Used after Beyond Blade 3rd Hit.
fifthMain.desc: After the 3rd attack of , Fenrir will appear and slam down on the ground
details: Used automatically after 3rd hit
Prevents knockback while active
Deals increased %Damage the fewer enemies hit
Has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
In , an iceberge will appear dealing damage to nearby enemies

fifthMain.name: Blizzard Tempest
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 8, Stun Duration: 10.
Stun Duration can increase up to 100% depending on the damage dealt with this attack. For 20 sec afterwards, activates an aura that periodically casts the Dire Wolf's curse on up to 10 enemies. Using the skill again, while its effect is active, will cancel that effect.
Dire Wolf's Curse: Duration: 10 sec, Upon a successful hit, attacks up to 15 enemies under the curse with ice chunks, dealing 950% damage 4 time(s). The curse can stack up to 6 time(s), and the ice chunks increase by 1 in proportion to the accumulated curse.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates a blizzard that binds nearby enemies and debuffs them
details:
After casting, you gain an aura that inflicts the same debuff
  • Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the aura

When hit by any attack except , an icicle strikes down on that enemy and damages nearby enemy
  • For each attack, the debuff stacks (up to 6 times) which will increase the number of icicles created
  • Icicles are unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Aran is a STR warrior class part of the Heroes class group. Aran is a swift heavy attacker that utilizes a special Combo mechanic. Upon reaching max combo, Aran will go into an Adrenaline Rush where you gain incredible powers. The class naturally deals heavy damage and is suitable for beginners
